channel.title: How do I keep my Account Safe?
channel.description: Omfg everytime I get a expensive or RARE item I get booted off and someone goes on !! I got a fire cape less then 30 seconds later I get booted off and someone else is logged in!! Need help how I can prevent this I've only been playing for a day. I could get like 90B worth of stuff but cant cuase I'll get key logged or something.. help!

item.title: How do I keep my Account Safe?
item.dc:creator: @guthan554 guthan554
item.description:
@guthan554 wrote:

no duh man, a fire cape is a glitch item u put it on it freezez i guess u have to start another one, oh yea one more thing NO ONE CAN GO ON YOUR FILE THE FILE WAS MENT FOR U TO GO ON IT ITS ON UR CPU SERVER SO NO ONE FROM ANOTHER STATE CAN GO ON IT EXCEPT U!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I keep my Account Safe?

item.title: How do I keep my Account Safe?

item.description:

you either have a glitched acnt… or you will jsut have to make another acnt… sry
